Matrix Summary

Source: R/AllClasses.R
MatrixSummary-class.Rd

Matrix Summary

See also

Other matrix: AbundanceMatrix-class, CountMatrix-class, DataMatrix-class, IncidenceMatrix-class, OccurrenceMatrix-class, SimilarityMatrix-class, StratigraphicMatrix-class, coerce()

Author

N. Frerebeau

Examples

## Create a count data matrix
X <- CountMatrix(data = sample(1:10, 45, TRUE), nrow = 15)
summary(X)

#> --- All data (15 observations) -------------------------------------------------
#>       col1             col2            col3       
#>  Min.   : 1.000   Min.   :1.000   Min.   : 1.000  
#>  1st Qu.: 3.000   1st Qu.:1.500   1st Qu.: 2.500  
#>  Median : 7.000   Median :3.000   Median : 4.000  
#>  Mean   : 5.867   Mean   :3.667   Mean   : 4.733  
#>  3rd Qu.: 8.500   3rd Qu.:4.500   3rd Qu.: 7.000  
#>  Max.   :10.000   Max.   :9.000   Max.   :10.000  

## Summary by groups
set_groups(X) <- rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 5)
summary(X)

#> --- A (5 observations) ---------------------------------------------------------
#>       col1           col2        col3     
#>  Min.   : 1.0   Min.   :1   Min.   : 1.0  
#>  1st Qu.: 3.0   1st Qu.:2   1st Qu.: 2.0  
#>  Median : 9.0   Median :3   Median : 4.0  
#>  Mean   : 6.6   Mean   :3   Mean   : 4.8  
#>  3rd Qu.:10.0   3rd Qu.:4   3rd Qu.: 7.0  
#>  Max.   :10.0   Max.   :5   Max.   :10.0  
#> --- B (5 observations) ---------------------------------------------------------
#>       col1          col2        col3    
#>  Min.   :4.0   Min.   :1   Min.   :1.0  
#>  1st Qu.:5.0   1st Qu.:3   1st Qu.:3.0  
#>  Median :7.0   Median :3   Median :3.0  
#>  Mean   :6.4   Mean   :4   Mean   :4.2  
#>  3rd Qu.:8.0   3rd Qu.:4   3rd Qu.:7.0  
#>  Max.   :8.0   Max.   :9   Max.   :7.0  
#> --- C (5 observations) ---------------------------------------------------------
#>       col1          col2        col3    
#>  Min.   :1.0   Min.   :1   Min.   :2.0  
#>  1st Qu.:2.0   1st Qu.:1   1st Qu.:3.0  
#>  Median :3.0   Median :4   Median :7.0  
#>  Mean   :4.6   Mean   :4   Mean   :5.2  
#>  3rd Qu.:8.0   3rd Qu.:6   3rd Qu.:7.0  
#>  Max.   :9.0   Max.   :8   Max.   :7.0
